chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 12 is experiencing the following issue:

Hello, 
I was charged an additional €4.99 on top of my bill.

For accounting purposes, I would need an invoice with this surplus and therefore a maximum amount of €350.23 as soon as possible.

Thank you very much

Thank you for your help,

Hi ecomobile,

The customer has requested the invoice for this order.

Can you please provide us with the invoice within the next 48 hours so that we can send it to the customer?

As a reminder, if the invoice is not sent within 48 working hours of this request, we will have to make a goodwill gesture of 20% of the amount of the order (including VAT but excluding delivery costs) up to a maximum of €50.

We look forward to receiving your reply. 

Thank you for your partnership and support.

Yours sincerely
Lucia, from the BackCare team

Dear Backcare,

Attached is the invoice.

Regards,
AS
